name: storage-server
description: An easy to setup and optimized storing solution using Bun & Elysia.
author: M336

scripts.compile: bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify --sourcemap --bytecode ./app.js --outfile ./build/storage-server_windows-x64.exe && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --minify --sourcemap --bytecode ./app.js --outfile ./build/storage-server_macos-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --minify --sourcemap --bytecode ./app.js --outfile ./build/storage-server_macos-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --minify --sourcemap --bytecode ./app.js --outfile ./build/storage-server_linux-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --minify --sourcemap --bytecode ./app.js --outfile ./build/storage-server_linux-arm64
